definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
case insensitive/not distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters
pinyin: bu4 qu1 fen1 da4 xiao3 xie3

definition: case sensitive/distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters

sentences.english: The case-sensitive name of the schema.
The case-sensitive name of the schema into which the objects are to be restored.
sentences.chinese: 要将对象恢复到的模式的大小写敏感名。
访问元素是区分大小写的。

sentences.english: Please quote decal adhered to table top permanently and option to adhere decal to case.
sentences.chinese: 请报至工作台面贴花坚持永久选项坚持贴花大小写。

sentences.english: Fill out the next screen as follows, ensuring that you use the correct case for the names.
sentences.chinese: 如下填写下一屏，确保名称的大小写正确。

sentences.english: Remember that when you enter your username, it is case-sensitive!
sentences.chinese: 记住，当你输入用户名，它对大小写是敏感的。

sentences.english: The enhanced security settings include case-sensitive passwords.
sentences.chinese: 增强的安全特性包含了密码区分大小写。

sentences.english: The case-sensitive name of the new schema.
sentences.chinese: 新模式的大小写敏感名。

sentences.english: The case-sensitive name of the schema to be copied.
sentences.chinese: 要复制的模式的大小写敏感名。
这些巨集是不区分大小写的。

sentences.english: It is not possible to restrict the case insensitivity to specific tables or columns.
sentences.chinese: 不可能以区分大小写的方式处理特定的表或列。

sentences.english: Pseudo-element and pseudo-class names are case-insensitive.
sentences.chinese: 伪元素和伪类的名称都不区分大小写。

sentences.english: A few parameters affect mangling of file name case.
sentences.chinese: 有一些参数会影响名称大小写的改编。

sentences.english: When the last names are the same. sort those by first name( again, without.
sentences.chinese: 当姓一样时，按名排序，不计大小写。

sentences.english: Fields use regular expressions syntax, case-insensitive.
sentences.chinese: 栏位使用正规表示式语法且大小写相异。

sentences.english: Note that the filter is case sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 请注意过滤器是区分大小写的。

blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
case insensitive/not distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters

definition: character set (e.g. ASCII 美國資訊交換標準碼|美国资讯交换标准码 or Unicode 統一碼|统一码)
